title: My Husband Is Scared Of His Family
itunes:title: My Husband Is Scared Of His Family
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’ve been married to a wonderful man for almost 3 years. It’s his second marriage and my first. Everything is fine with us, except the fact that his mom and his aunts don’t like me. My husband has never tried to fix this problem because I think he’s scared of the women in his family. Recently, things got out of hand and my feelings were hurt. Here’s what happened… His mom had a 60th birthday party and I didn’t want to go, but my husband insisted that I go. When we got to the party, his mother gave me a fake smile and barely spoke. His aunts avoided me so they wouldn’t have to speak to me.............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
